website_summaries.verdict: Among the things users love about the Under Armour Lockdown 3 include the excellent comfort and support it offers. This affordable basketball shoe also impresses with a stylish look that has definitely earned it some fans. Then again, some had a few issues with these sneakers starting from a lack of breathability to a need for better cushioning. Overall though, these shoes from Under Armour give good value for money, as attested by its buyers.
pros: Many reviewers say that the Under Armour Lockdown 3 gives good value for money, pretty much like the much more popular UA Curry 6
These basketball shoes provide excellent foot support, observes some wearers
A good number of users commend the overall comfort that these sneakers offer
The great look of these basketball shoes from Baltimore-based Under Armour appeals to many shoe enthusiasts
cons: Some users are disappointed about the Lockdown 3’s lack of ventilation for the foot
These sneakers have poor cushioning, reacts some players who tried it out
Wearers find the laces of these shoes for basketball to be quite short for their liking
A few users also have some issues with the position of the laces, saying it caused some discomfort on the midfoot

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to replace some Adidas Alphabounce Beyond shoes. I wear a regular size D width but my heel kept sliding up and down. They have very little cushion and arch support. The tongue is very thick and the shoe strings are too short... could barely tie them. I returned them the next morning. I do not recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery L. Stockford

customer_reviews.title: way too small
customer_reviews.text: I always wear a size 9 in tennis shoes no matter the brand. I have never had this issue until now but when i tried these on they were so narrow and tight that i couldn't even get my toes in them. they felt like a vice grip. I'm extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mako670

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made shoes, but run small
customer_reviews.text: This shoes looks soooo stylish to be Basketball shoes, they are beautiful. I bought them for my 14 years old son and he's very happy with his new shoes. The only problem here is the size, i have readed a lot of comments here before the purchase about that they run small, and they were all right, my son wears size 9 normally, these i bought it half size up 9.5 and still feels a little snug, but is ok. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: KIKUSA

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little too snug
customer_reviews.text: The fit was just slightly small in the outside toe area. That’s my complaint. Also, they lose grip of the court rather quickly. Other shoes were squeaking... I was sliding
customer_reviews.author: HNIC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for school. At first he absolutely loved them. They were very comfortable. But a few days ago a loop where the shoe string goes through broke. He can't wear them now bc they feel really loose. He has only wore them for about 2 months give or take. Usually he can have a pair last him the whole school year... Very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure you can call it a Basketball shoe because the sole it very rigid and it doesn't cushion the foot when you jump. If it's for Basketball look at other brands. if you are looking casual wear then I guess this will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I tried to cancel order before shipping because I received a similar pair that I had to return. Seller wants $140 shipping to return them! Too small and not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ranting From Reno

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice basketball shoe and the fit is really comfortable and true to size. The only complaint that kept this from being 5 stars is that, even though the ankle is quilted and appears would be more comfortable it is very stiff at first and takes longer than expected to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: These are very narrow. Order a half size larger than you wear. My husband said they fit like a vice grip on his feet. We bought another pair a half size larger and that was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John S Byrum

customer_reviews.title: Wont fit wide feet well
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great shoe. My husband has more wife feet and these were too narrow so we wmsent them back.
customer_reviews.author: BNR

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them! No complaints at all. In fact, I almost didn't want to rate them for fear I might not be able to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour with class!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is so comfortable and stylish. I get a lot of compliments on the shoe. I bought them for working out but now they are my mall wear.
customer_reviews.author: Daryle t Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Quality sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I got this shoe for my 14 years old, his foot has grown to a size 14 this year. Big boy. I must say he hasn't ripped any parts of the shoe yet and they seem to be lasting him this school year. Very expensive,but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JR.

customer_reviews.title: Ankles took very long to break in, rather uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size large as per recommendation and they fit well. They support well for walking on concrete all day at work, but the uppers are extremely stiff, especially around the ankle. They were bordering on painful for the first several days and took nearly a month to break in properly. I absolutely would spend $20-30 more for the Nike equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: Philly

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes good price I found out that when buying Under Armour shoes go with a half size larger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Nike. Break in period necessary!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I am on my feet all day working for UPS. No break in period necessary. I only hope they last. I usually only wear nike.
customer_reviews.author: Allen H.

customer_reviews.title: Fits in the smaller side
customer_reviews.text: Shoe runs on smaller side, but 11 y.o. son loves the color and feel of the shoe for basketball. Happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: revmeyer

customer_reviews.title: They run small
customer_reviews.text: Extremely narrow... length was short too. Shoes looked great though.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Shoates

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely great value. I've already bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: AC DC ROCKS

customer_reviews.title: Smallish but Overall Good Basketball Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I almost returned shoes because they were about half a size to small. (I wear 13M). Glad I kept them. After wearing them a few times, and eliminating one of the two pairs of socks I usually wear, they fit fine. The shoes seem well-made, although not ideal. Overall, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe for teenaged son. Comfortable and he is hard to fit. Good support.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T.

customer_reviews.title: Good park bball shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable out of the box. Played two hours of basketball and my feet felt fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Seltzer

customer_reviews.title: Hot
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy second pair so she can match with her bestfriend
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these shoes. In fact, he wants to wear them everyday because they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After wearing 4 times the rubber sole is pulling away from the shoe and the stripes are rubbing off. I would expect better quality from UA.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Be aware! These run and fit super small. I ordered a size 7.5 and it won't fit. I tried to return to amazon and they are charging me a re stocking fee. Very dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Not true to the size!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are not women sizes, or they are knockoffs. That's only explanation for how huge they are. I got size 8 and it was a 10 if not bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: He loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these fory son, he LOVES them! Great fit, very comfortable, as was told to me by my very satisfied son!
customer_reviews.author: Velna Rebecca Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical if these shoes are legit
customer_reviews.text: Wonder if these are knock off under armour shoes or did someone try to add the striping to them afterwards. 2'nd time I wore them, the striping was already peeling off. Very disappointed in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: David Helmic

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: A sharp looking pair of shoes. Looks as if they are better made than some of the other well known brands. So far they have been comfortable to walk around in.
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the value
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my husband for Christmas and they were everything I expected, he loved them!! A++
customer_reviews.author: Qtewashington

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last two months.
customer_reviews.text: I go to put my shoes away and I notice on the corner of my eye the lace strap was broke.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 9 days
customer_reviews.text: One of the laces-holders broke after a little over a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Zubric

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great show for the price. Comfortable and good for casual playing
customer_reviews.author: Ben Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe to walk around in. Could be worn to work with dress pants
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Purchased to double as dress shoes and the under Armour logo is not visible in pants. The leather looks like dress shoe leather as well.
customer_reviews.author: David Tiwari

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I like them. Order a 1/2 bigger then normal. Holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Brookee

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Only name brand that seems to last! 13 year old loved these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoes for my son and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: GO

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It was a very comfortable shoe .The major downside is the shoelaces that connect it to the shoe are held together by string down the shoe.I only wore this shoe twice and was only walking and it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: We love the look and my son loves the comfort when he plays basket ball
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: My son loved them. Will order shoes from amazon all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 2 weeks and it started coming apart , worst shoes I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Marin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved them. He even tries to take care of them for once!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A. Trigos

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: For a basketball shoe, it doesn’t have much padding, but still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James Bogle

customer_reviews.title: Maybe order half a size larger for better fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit is a little bit tight on the front on the sneakers, otherwise they feel ok. The look is nice
customer_reviews.author: angel garcia

customer_reviews.title: Had the shoes in two days
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. Very pleased Told a friend about them and he ordered a pair
customer_reviews.author: johnny k. neely

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Lockdown 3 3020622-001 Basketball Shoes
feature_bullets: Breathable mesh upper with a combination of leather and lightweight synthetic overlays for lateral and medial support
TPU hot melt film toe cap for added protection and durability
Air mesh tongue for added breathability and a comfortable fit
Die-cut EVA sockliner provides underfoot cushioning and support
Injection molded EVA midsole delivers a lightweight and responsive ride
Durable solid rubber outsole with herringbone traction pattern throughout to provide exceptional on-court movement and control
